segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink overflowing all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, oblivious, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool is going to fall, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, cookies in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, hand out like she deserves one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they just ask nicely instead of this sneaking around?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is all neat and calm, mocking this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so frustrated watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined from the water.
segments.speaker: PAR
